original_text: But if the priest examines it and there is no white hair in it and it is not deeper than the skin, but has faded, then the priest shall shut him up seven days.
korean_text: 그러나 제사장이 진찰하여 거기 흰 털이 없고 피부보다 얕지 아니하고 빛이 엷으면 제사장은 그를 이레 동안 가두어둘 것이며

sentences.original_text: But if the priest examines it
and there is no white hair in it
and it is not deeper than the skin
then the priest shall shut him up seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그를 이레 동안 격리시켜야 할 것이라
